scripts.docker:stop-container: wrap () { if [ -n "$(docker ps -a -q -f name=$1)" ]; then docker stop $1 ; fi }; wrap
scripts.docker:stop-all-containers: yarn docker:stop-container woofbot-mongodb-dev-container && yarn docker:stop-container woofbot-container && yarn docker:stop-container woofbot-server-dev-container
scripts.docker:clean: yarn docker:stop-container woofbot-container && yarn docker:stop-container woofbot-server-dev-container && for IMAGE_ID in $(docker images -q 'woofbot/*'); do docker image rm $IMAGE_ID; done
scripts.docker:build-server-dev: docker buildx build -f Dockerfile-server-dev --platform linux/amd64 --progress plain --tag woofbot/woofbot-server-dev . --load
scripts.docker:build-to-registry: docker buildx build --platform linux/arm64,linux/amd64 --progress plain --tag woofbot/woofbot:v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") . --output type=registry
scripts.dev:mongodb: mkdir -p dev-mongodb-data && yarn docker:stop-container woofbot-mongodb-dev-container && docker run --rm --sig-proxy=true --net woofbotnetwork --ip 172.18.0.2 -p 27017:27017 -v $PWD/dev-mongodb-data:/data/db --name woofbot-mongodb-dev-container mongo:4.4.6-bionic
scripts.dev:bitcoind:fill-conf: if [ ! -f 'dev-bitcoind-data/.bitcoin/bitcoin.conf' ]; then mkdir -p dev-bitcoind-data/.bitcoin dev-bitcoind-data/data1 dev-bitcoind-data/data2 && cp dev-bitcoin.conf dev-bitcoind-data/.bitcoin/bitcoin.conf && cp dev-bitcoin2.conf dev-bitcoind-data/data2/bitcoin.conf; fi
scripts.dev:bitcoind: yarn dev:bitcoind:fill-conf && yarn docker:stop-container bitcoind-node && docker run --rm --sig-proxy=true --net woofbotnetwork --ip 172.18.0.3 -p 29000:29000 -p 18444:18444 -p 18443:18443 -v $PWD/dev-bitcoind-data/.bitcoin:/bitcoin/.bitcoin -v $PWD/dev-bitcoind-data/data1:/bitcoin/data1 -v $PWD/dev-test-scenarios:/test-scenarios --name bitcoind-node kylemanna/bitcoind@sha256:b4e1c7e5c3e51557a625c053c875c0ee69f88a51a92f21b6f7b71b0f3cc6f6cc
scripts.dev:server: if [ -z "$(docker images -q 'woofbot/woofbot-server-dev')" ]; then echo 'Server dev image not found, must run first: yarn docker:build-server-dev'; exit 1; fi; yarn docker:stop-container woofbot-server-dev && docker run --rm -i -t -p 8080:8080 -v $PWD/packages/server/src:/app/packages/server/src --env-file .env.dev-docker --name woofbot-server-dev-container woofbot/woofbot-server-dev
scripts.dev: yarn common lint && yarn common build && yarn client lint && yarn server lint && yarn docker:build-server-dev && npm-run-all -p dev:mongodb dev:bitcoind dev:client dev:server
scripts.lint: yarn common lint && yarn client lint && yarn server lint
scripts.clean: yarn common clean && yarn client clean && yarn server clean
scripts.clean-all: rimraf dev-mongodb-data dev-bitcoind-data && yarn clean && yarn docker:clean
